attributes.review:
I am furious. 

For starters, the app took 93 weeks to download and took up almost all of my storage?!?!!!???
When I opened the app I thought everything would be fine, living my best life amiright? But then, my dogs turned into mosquitos, my toothbrush grew wings, my toaster disappeared and my tiktok page turned STRAIGHT. It was petrifying. 
I ran to the bathroom in a hop skip and a jump to vomit and feel guilty for what I had done.
I realized what an error I had committed.
On top of that my period calendar committed suicide so now Iâ€™m stuck with it for the next 85 days.
NEVER, under ANY CIRCUMSTANCES, get this app. 
You will regret it, please.
